task_description: 生成中餐米线店外卖打包3D ICON图标，Q版可爱风格，Pixar卡通美学

input_data.text_prompt: 3D icon design, Chinese rice noodle restaurant takeout packaging scene, cute Q-version style, Pixar aesthetic. Main subject: white/transparent plastic takeout box (round or square with lid slightly open), revealing golden rice noodle soup (#FFD700). Core elements: disposable chopsticks (wood/bamboo texture #D2B48C) placed horizontally on the box or in the bag, small condiment packets (red chili oil packet #DC143C, vinegar packet, soy sauce packet) scattered nearby, optional white takeout bag (#F5F5F0). Scene composition: takeout box as main focus, lid slightly open showing golden soup, chopsticks on top or in bag, condiment packets beside, conveying 'portable and convenient' practical feel, hot steam rising from the box creating 'freshly cooked, hot' freshness. Colors: white takeout box (#FFFAF0, #F5F5DC), transparent lid with highlights (#FFFFFF), golden soup (#FFD700) peeking from box, wood chopstick wrapper (#D2B48C), red chili oil packet (#DC143C), white takeout bag (#F5F5F0), optional dark blue brand color (#2B4A7C) for logo. Textures: plastic box with glossy highlights, soft paper bag texture, thin plastic film on condiment packets, disposable chopsticks wood/bamboo texture. Chinese takeout details: steam rising from box, typical disposable chopsticks packaging, small condiment packets, round and cute box, conveying 'just out of the kitchen, steaming hot' freshness. 3/4 front view, slightly top-down angle, pure white or transparent background, 1024x1024px, top + 45-degree front dual light sources, 3D rendering style, Pixar cartoon aesthetic, high-resolution details, commercial-grade quality.
design_requirements: 突出中餐米线店外卖打包文化特色
热气腾腾、新鲜、便捷的视觉传达
与堂食ICON形成对比，与米线ICON呼应
商业级质量，适合品牌应用

metadata.notes: 中餐米线店外卖打包3D ICON，参考input\吼巷\设计\IP\微信图片_20250923171141_52_171.png风格，强调便捷、新鲜、热腾腾的外卖特色
